alert.note: Alert for Dale; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:50AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dale and northwestern Houston Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 950 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Daleville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Napier Field, Hollis Dairy Road, Hunt Field, Waterford, Knox Field, Ewell, Cairns Aaf, Sylvan Grove, Green Acres, Bagwells Crossroads and Power Dam Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
